summary: Based on Tsun Armor, CBBE Required for female version.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#999999][b]Introduction[/b][/color][/size]
I always liked Tsun armor so I decided to make it a
full armor set, both male and female versions have working
weight sliders and I have created ground objects for it.


[size=3][color=#999999][b]Description[/b][/color][/size]
This mod adds silver armor to the game under the
miscellaneous category of the blacksmith forge, 
the advanced armors perk is required.


[size=3][color=#999999][b]Crafting Requirements[/b][/color][/size]
Circlet:      1xSilver Ingot, 2xSteel Ingot
Gauntlets:  2xSilver Ingot. 2xSteel Ingot
Armor:       4xSilver Ingot, 3xSteel Ingot, 2xLeather, 3xLeather Strips
Boots:       1xSilver Ingot, 3xSteel Ingot, 2xLeather Strips


[size=3][color=#999999][b]Required Mods[/b][/color][/size]
Female Silver Armor is for the CBBE Body.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666[/url]


[size=3][color=#999999][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]
Thank you to the following mod authors who
have allowed me to use their work:

Caliente
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE Body Mod[/url]

Neovinci
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16381]Witch Armour[/url]

MAK07
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004]Remodeled Armor[/url]

JosefGrey
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16781]Remodeled Armor- Non Nude[/url]




[size=3][color=#999999][b]Videos[/b][/color][/size]

[youtube]cjsaE6B_s6c[/youtube]
Please note this is Light Armor and its stats fall between Scale and Glass Armors,
and should not be compared to heavy armor stats.
author: Acolyte598
